statements: DELETE FROM patient_feedback WHERE satisfaction_rating < 3 AND feedback_text LIKE '%poor%'
DELETE FROM ConsultationQuality WHERE doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith' AND consultation_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM PatientFeedback WHERE survey_id = 10 AND satisfaction_score < 3;
DELETE FROM ConsultationQuality WHERE quality_rating > 4 AND consultation_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM consultation WHERE patient_id = 5 AND consultation_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM virtual_consultations WHERE patient_id = 100 AND consultation_date = '2023-01-15';
